overview: A collection of classic hits from the stable of one of Britainâ€™s greatest and most successful music producers, the legendary Trevor Horn. From his early days as frontman with The Buggles right up to recent collaborations with the likes of Robbie Williams, this film examines how Trevor has become the go-to producer for acts keen to tap into the musical genius that defined the sound of the 1980s. Track listing:  Buggles | Video Killed the Radio Star  Frankie Goes to Hollywood | Relax  Robbie Williams | Bodies  Yes | Owner of a Lonely Heart  ABC | The Look of Love  Spandau Ballet | Instinction  Dollar | Mirror Mirror  Grace Jones | Slave to the Rhythm  Pet Shop Boys | Left to My Own Devices  t.A.T.u. | All the Things She Said  Malcolm McLaren | Double Dutch  Art of Noise | Close (to the Edit)  Tom Jones | If I Only Knew  Belle and Sebastian | Step Into My Office Baby  Gary Barlow & Robbie Williams | Shame  Seal | Crazy
title: Trevor Horn at the BBC
